concept.title: Impact of Coil Adjustment on Engine Starting
concept.shortdesc: Proper coil vibrator adjustment is crucial for efficient engine starting, as it affects the current required for point contact and spark generation.

conbody.p: Improper vibrator adjustment increases the current required to make and break contact between points. At cranking speeds, this can prevent spark generation between spark plug points, making engine starting difficult.
